name: Kuchiriel
body:
**My name is Matheus Almeida**, and I'm a **curious**. I have passion for minimal interfaces, general tec security, and artificial intelligence. I also love tweaking **Arch Linux**. 

I see myself as a natural **geek**, i really love to **solve problems**. I have some interest in science disclosure, and science itself. I was born in a small city based in SÃ£o Paulo/Brazil. I speak an intermediate English, also as a native, I speak Portuguese.

I've graduated as a Computer Network Technician, but I'm currently Attending Analysis and Systems Development. 

Sometimes I like to write stuff, lists, tutorials and code. (:

I am currently unemployed. If you want, you can view a [more detailed description of me.](https://github.com/Kuchiriel/about-me)

If you have any questions, feedback, or just want to say hello, you can contact me at matheus.almeida55@outlook.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
